modShortDescription: Adds recipe for crafting a sewing kit from 10 raw cotton, 1 scrap polymer, and 1 scrap iron.
modDescription:
Adds recipe for crafting a sewing kit from 10 raw cotton, 1 scrap polymer, and 1 scrap iron.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/XelaNull/7DTD-ShoudensModlets/tree/master/7DTD-SewingKit)**

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/25892-shoudens-misc-modlets-a20/).
